ModMetaData.name: Xenohuman Expanded [Facial Animation Patch]
ModMetaData.author: HohenHeizen
ModMetaData.description:
Patches for Facial Animations by Nals for Xenohuman Expanded, a mod by ILuvSilicon and SirLalaPy.
Includes custom heads for Glitterworlder & Radworlder!!
--- Contains: • Glitterworlder • Lo-Gravver • Vatdrone • Gravity dwarf • Radworlder
Todo: More custom heads? Hm.
Version <color=#FFD800>1.1.5</color>
